meanings.sent1: The peskier mosquito kept buzzing around my head.
meanings.sent2: The peskier students in class always disrupt the lesson.
meanings.sent3: The peskier alarm clock decided to go off an hour early today.
meanings.sent4: The peskier sibling was like a constant buzzing in my ear.
meanings.sent5: The peskier homework assignment seemed to never end.

meanings.definition: More annoying or troublesome than something else
meanings.sent1: The peskier dog barked louder than the others in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The peskier traffic jam made me late for work.
meanings.sent3: The peskier rainstorm decided to follow me wherever I went.
meanings.sent4: The peskier sibling's teasing was like nails on a chalkboard.
meanings.sent5: The peskier problem at work seemed impossible to solve.
